topic.title: 주말 소풍 계획하기
topic.description: 이번 주말에 친구와 함께 공원으로 소풍 갈 계획을 세우는 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 별일 없어. 그냥 집에서 쉴까 생각 중이야.
우리 샌드위치랑 과일 좀 싸가면 어때?
그럼 내가 샌드위치 만들게. 어디로 가는 게 좋을까?
중앙 공원이 좋을 것 같아. 거기가 넓고 조용하잖아.
완벽해! 그럼 토요일 오전 11시에 공원 입구에서 만나자.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What are you doing this weekend?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What are you doing | this weekend?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Nothing special. I'm just thinking of resting at home.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Nothing special. || I'm just thinking of | resting at home.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: How about we pack some sandwiches and fruits?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: How about we pack | some sandwiches and fruits?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: That's a great idea! I'll bring the fruits.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: That's a great idea! || I'll bring the fruits.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Then I'll make the sandwiches. Where should we go?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Then I'll make the sandwiches. || Where should we go?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I think Central Park would be nice. It's spacious and quiet there.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I think Central Park | would be nice. || It's spacious and quiet | there.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Perfect! Then let's meet at the park entrance at 11 a.m. on Saturday.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Perfect! || Then let's meet | at the park entrance | at 11 a.m. on Saturday.
